Posts.Content: Jul 31, 2016 07:37PM pjparsons wrote: I had major swelling after a 3 hour flight. I wore my sleeve on the plane but it was not enough to stop my arm from swelling. My therapist said I would benefit from being wrapped for flying. As much as I dislike being wrapped, I dislike my arm being that big even more!!
Posts.Title: Flying with Lymphedema? debbis pjparsons
